author: ETA PRIME
description:
Red Dead Redemption is finally on mobile and I had to push it a bit. 😅 In this video I test it on everything from a $25 Walmart Android phone (spoiler: it doesn’t go well) all the way up to a Snapdragon flagship and an iPhone with Apple’s latest chip.
We’ll see how Red Dead Redemption runs on a 10th gen iPad with the A14, a RedMagic 11 Pro powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 5, and an iPhone 14 Pro Max with the A19 Pro. I go over the graphics options, fidelity vs performance mode, resolution scaling, controller support, and why low-end Android devices just can’t handle it right now.
If you’ve got a Netflix account, you can play this version of Red Dead Redemption on your phone or tablet, and your saves even sync between iOS and Android. In my opinion it’s still one of the best games ever made, and it actually feels great on mobile with a proper controller.

8BitDo Ultimate Mobile Gaming Controller : https://amzn.to/4iOjXqM
iPad: https://amzn.to/4iIc8CR
Red magic 11 pro: https://amzn.to/48JDmV
title: Red Dead Redemption on Mobile Is Amazing - iOS vs Android!
